metadata.title: USN-6839-1 -- MariaDB vulnerability
metadata.description: A security issue was discovered in MariaDB and this update includes new upstream MariaDB versions to fix the issue.  MariaDB has been updated to 10.6.18 in Ubuntu 22.04 LTS and to 10.11.8 in Ubuntu 23.10 and Ubuntu 24.04 LTS.  In addition to security fixes, the updated packages contain bug fixes, new features, and possibly incompatible changes.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6839-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libmariadb-dev - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 libmariadb-dev-compat - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 libmariadb3 - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 libmariadbd-dev - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 libmariadbd19t64 - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-backup - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-client - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-client-core - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-common - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-connect - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-cracklib-password-check - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-gssapi-client - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-gssapi-server - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-hashicorp-key-management - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-provider-bzip2 - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-provider-lz4 - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-provider-lzma - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-provider-lzo - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-provider-snappy - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-rocksdb - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-s3 - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-plugin-spider - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-server - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-server-10.5 - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-server-core - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-test - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 mariadb-test-data - 1:10.11.8-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 No subscription required
